00018 class dbColumnBinding { 
00019   public:
00020     dbColumnBinding*   next;
00021     dbFieldDescriptor* fd;
00022     int                cliType;
00023     int                len;
00024     char*              ptr;
00025 
00026     int  unpackArray(char* dst, size_t& offs);
00027     void unpackScalar(char* dst, bool insert);
00028 
00029     dbColumnBinding(dbFieldDescriptor* field, int type) { 
00030         fd = field;
00031         cliType = type;
00032         next = NULL;
00033     }
00034 };
00035 
00036 struct dbParameterBinding { 
00037     union { 
00038         int1       i1;
00039         int2       i2;
00040         int4       i4;
00041         db_int8    i8;
00042         real4      r4;
00043         real8      r8;
00044         oid_t      oid;
00045         bool       b;
00046         char*      str;
00047         rectangle  rect;
00048     } u;
00049     int type;
00050 };

00052 const int dbQueryMaxIdLength = 256;
00053 
00054 class dbQueryScanner { 
00055   public:
00056     char*    p;
00057     db_int8     ival;
00058     real8    fval;
00059     char     buf[dbQueryMaxIdLength];
00060     char*    ident;
00061 
00062     int  get();
00063 
00064     void reset(char* stmt) { 
00065         p = stmt;
00066     }
00067 };
00068     
00069 class dbStatement { 
00070   public:
00071     int                 id;
00072     bool                firstFetch;
00073     dbStatement*        next;
00074     dbAnyCursor*        cursor; 
00075     dbQuery             query;
00076     dbColumnBinding*    columns;
00077     char*               buf;
00078     int                 buf_size;
00079     int                 n_params;
00080     int                 n_columns;
00081     dbParameterBinding* params;
00082     dbTableDescriptor*  table;
00083     
00084     void reset();
00085 
00086     dbStatement(int stmt_id) { 
00087         id = stmt_id;
00088         columns = NULL;
00089         params = NULL;
00090         buf = NULL;
00091         buf_size = 0;
00092         table = NULL;
00093         cursor = NULL;
00094     }
00095     ~dbStatement() { 
00096         reset(); 
00097         delete[] buf;
00098     }
00099 };

00110 };
